verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G2257><s%> earthly <S%G1919><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> our tabernacle <S%G4636><s%> be dissolved <S%G2647><s%>, we have <S%G2192><s%> a building <S%G3619><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%>, a house <S%G3614><s%> not made with hands <S%G886><s%>, eternal <S%G166><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> verily <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> we groan <S%G4727><s%>, longing <S%G1971><s%> to be clothed upon <S%G1902><s%> with our <S%G2257><s%> habitation <S%G3613><s%> which is from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>:
if <S%G1489><s%> so be that <S%G2532><s%> being clothed <S%G1746><s%> we shall <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> indeed <S%G2532><s%> we that are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this tabernacle <S%G4636><s%> do groan <S%G4727><s%>, being burdened <S%G916><s%>; not <S%G2309><s%> for <S%G1894><s%> that <S%G3756><s%> we would <S%G1562><s%> be unclothed <S%G235><s%>, but <S%G1902><s%> that we would be clothed <S%G2443><s%> upon <S%G2666><s%>, that what is mortal <S%G5259><s%> may be swallowed up <S%G2222><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> wrought <S%G2716><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this very <S%G846><s%> thing <S%G5124><s%> is God <S%G2316><s%>, who3588, 2532 gave <S%G1325><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> the earnest <S%G728><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

Being therefore <S%G3767><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> of good courage <S%G2292><s%>, and knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%>, whilst <S%G2532><s%> we are at home <S%G1736><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%>, we are absent <S%G1553><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>

we are of good courage <S%G2292><s%>, I say <S%G2532><s%>, and are willing <S%G2106><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to be absent <S%G1553><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to be at home <S%G1736><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> also we make it our aim <S%G5389><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> at home <S%G1736><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> absent <S%G1553><s%>, to be <S%G1511><s%> well-pleasing <S%G2101><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> be made manifest <S%G5319><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the judgment-seat <S%G968><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> may receive <S%G2865><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> done in <S%G1223><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%>, according <S%G4314><s%> to what <S%G3739><s%> he hath done <S%G4238><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> it be good <S%G18><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> bad <S%G2556><s%>.

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, we persuade <S%G3982><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> we are made manifest <S%G5319><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> I hope <S%G1679><s%> that we are made manifest <S%G5319><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> consciences <S%G4893><s%>.

We <S%G1063><s%> are not <S%G3756><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> commending <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> speak as giving <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> of glorying <S%G2745><s%> on our <S%G2257><s%> behalf <S%G5228><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may have <S%G2192><s%> wherewith to <S%G4314><s%> answer them <S%G3588><s%> that glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> appearance <S%G4383><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in heart <S%G2588><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> we are beside ourselves <S%G1839><s%>, it is unto God <S%G2316><s%>; or whether <S%G1535><s%> we are of sober <S%G4993><s%> mind <S%G5213><s%>, it is unto you.

For <S%G1063><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> constraineth <S%G4912><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>; because <S%G5124><s%> we thus judge <S%G2919><s%>, that3754, 1487 one <S%G1520><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, therefore686, 599 all <S%G3956><s%> died <S%G599><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that live <S%G2198><s%> should <S%G2198><s%> no longer <S%G3371><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> unto themselves <S%G1438><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> unto him <S%G3588><s%> who for <S%G5228><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sakes died <S%G599><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rose again <S%G1453><s%>.

Wherefore5620, 575 we <S%G2249><s%> henceforth <S%G3568><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>: <S%G1161><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1487><s%> we have known <S%G1097><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, yet <S%G235><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> we <S%G1097><s%> know him so no more <S%G3765><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, he is a new <S%G2537><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%>: the old things <S%G744><s%> are passed away <S%G3928><s%>; behold <S%G2400><s%>, they <S%G3956><s%> are become <S%G1096><s%> new <S%G2537><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> reconciled <S%G2644><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> through1223, 2424 Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of reconciliation <S%G2643><s%>;

to wit <S%G5613><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> reconciling <S%G2644><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> unto himself <S%G1438><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> reckoning <S%G3049><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> their <S%G846><s%> trespasses <S%G3900><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> having committed <S%G5087><s%> unto <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of reconciliation <S%G2643><s%>.

We are ambassadors <S%G4243><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, as though <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> were entreating <S%G3870><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>: we beseech <S%G1189><s%> you on <S%G5228><s%> behalf <S%G5547><s%> of Christ <S%G2644><s%>, be ye reconciled to God <S%G2316><s%>.

<S%G1063><s%> Him <S%G4160><s%> who knew <S%G1097><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> he made to be sin <S%G266><s%> on our <S%G2257><s%> behalf <S%G5228><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
